item.title: 4th Docker Birthday Party in the Ruhr Area
item.description:
We love to use Docker in our daily business, that’s also why we organize a week after the Docker Birthday the DevOps Gathering (Maarch 23 - 25, 2017) in Bochum, a conference for docker container, kubernetes, devops and more!

But that was NO excuse not to celebrate the 4th Docker Birthday!

First of all..a BIG THANK YOU to

  • …Karen Bajza for spreading the Docker love and the 4th birthday vibes!
  • …Zalando for sponsoring this Docker Birthday Party in Dortmund and making this event possible!
  • …Setlog also for sponsoring this birthday meetup!
  • …bee42 for sponsoring the awesome, big (!!!) and delicious Docker Container Cake! (you can have a look below, there are a lot of pictures)
  • …our gorgeous baker of the bakery Mohr in Dortmund - thank you for the great cake and the details!
  • …our mentors Peter, Jan, Albert & Dima, Dimitry and Kevin - thank you for your support and expertise!
  • …Docker Captains Marcos Lilljedahl and Jonathan Leibiusky for creating play-with-docker, a fun and easy way to work through these labs and courses!
  • …

KEY FACTS

Before we tell and report you about OUR 4th Docker Birthday celebration, we like to give you some key fact:

  • …Docker in 80+ countries!
  • …over 154 Docker Birthday #4 celebrations were announced for this year!
  • …over 650 tweets about this year Docker Birthday celebration!
  • …6000+ RSVPs worldwide!
  • …700+ docker mentors worldwide!

TAKE AWAYS of the Docker Birthday last week:

  • …slides of this Docker Birthday MeetUp: https://speakerdeck.com/rossbachp/docker-birthday-introduction-meetup-bochum-dortmund
  • dicsount code for the DevOps Gathering in Bochum, Germany (30% off with the code: docker30)
  • dicount code for the DockerCon in Austin, America (30% off with the code: BDAY4)
  • Kevin & Ali from adesso won tickets (2-Day-Passes) for the DevOps Gathering!

OUR DOCKER BIRTHDAY PARTY

Our Docker Birthday #4 was celebrated at Zalando on the 16th March 2017. We brought both Community Groups from Bochum and Dortmund together to celebrate this event. To celebrate together we warmly welcomed newcomers and the already known Docker friends! We provided free Docker labs and courses to learn about Docker in a fun and inviting way.

We had hands-on with self-paced tutorials for every experience level from absolute beginners to professionals (with focus on beginners to intermediate).

The agenda for the Docker Birthday Party was as the following:

  • 18:00 - 18:30: Come together for dinner (Pizza & Drinks)
  • 18:30 - 18:45: Salutation and introductory words
  • 18:45 - 20:45: Mentoring sessions
  • 20:45 - 22:00: Celebration with drinks and a very special cake

We had a little schedule to finish all things we want to do. Our Meetup started with Pizza and Drinks to get strong enough for all problems that we wanted to solve. After this Peter Rossbach, our Docker expert, held an short introduction about Docker and the Docker Birthday courses.

With ending of the introduction all participants built small groups to handle the courses in a timeframe of two hours. In some groups there were dedicated Mentors for the courses, because Mentors likes as well to learn new stuff and take challenges :) . And the other groups could get help from Mentors On-Demand or Mentors ask them if they can help on the problems.

After our timeframe ended, we missed some important step: The Docker Birthday Cake - The most important part of the evening!

It looked so small but trust us - the cake was 20 centimeters high, 20 kg heavy and it was filled with raspberry (pi, hihi) creme and and chocolate!!

After our stomach hurted from the delicious cake and the little sugar overdose, we took our chance make a selfie with some people:

Next year we want to repeat this nice event. We hope that you can join us as well to celebrate this day! :-)
